criterion: Provides a list of inhaler brands for mild asthma therapy
Mentions Ventolin as an example of a SABA inhaler
Explains the difference between MDIs and DPIs
Falsely claims that all SABA inhalers are available over the counter
Asks the user to discuss with a healthcare provider for personalized recommendations
Provides a clear and concise explanation of the different inhaler categories
Mentions potential side effects for each inhaler category
Does not mention any red flags or contraindications for mild asthma therapy
Correctly explains the importance of proper inhaler technique
Does not provide any information about availability and prescription status
